alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 7:49AM CDT until May 28 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Arkansas City. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural lands can be expected with bank overflows on west side of river. West Chestnut Avenue west of the river floods, expect road closure. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.3 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 5.6 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Arkansas River Arkansas City 11.0 11.3 Sat 7 am CDT 8.7 7.1 6.7 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
